full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN CHOS RGYAL GYI SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR GYI CHO GA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES PA 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE'I GSHED KYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA BA MING BTANG NAS TSIG CHOG @003B GI MTHUN PA GCIG BYAS LA MANG PO YOD DANG, CHOS RGYAL GYIS BZLOG BSGYUR YIG RNYED MA RNYED PA DANG, SNGA MA NI DON GNYER CAN BKA' BSKUL ZHING, SLAR YANG SMAN PA BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS SBYIN BDAG GI RIM GROR DOGS PA ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR TSIG ,RANG RANG SKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA PHAN NO AO SRING SNYAN PA'I SLOB GNYER MA BYAS PA'I BLON PO, SNYIN KHAMS CHOS KYI BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNGS RGYUN LA BRTEN NAS SU 'BRING PA BGYI'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE'I DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O, ,)
